name: Sputnik VI
description:
Save the galaxy! Prevent the coronavirus from spreading to other planets. Play Sputnik VI and become the next hero of the universe. 

Drift right or left and fire at attacking viruses with your vaccine syringe. Play the slow-moving Sputnik VI and become the next hero of the universe.

Sputnik Vaccine Injector is a black 'n white shooter arcade game where you play as a syringe who sprays coronaviruses with deadly vaccine-bullets.
